vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Manasseh living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.17;
son of: Ulam (H0198)
§ Bedan = "in judging"
1) a judge who followed Gideon
2) a Manassite
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   juez de Israel; (b)   hijo de Ulam; tribu de Manasés
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
比但 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "審判中"
1) 以色列的士師 (撒上 12:11)
2) 一位瑪拿西人 (代上 7:17)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
比但 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "审判中"
1) 以色列的士师 (撒上 12:11)
2) 一位玛拿西人 (代上 7:17)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Jdg.4.6;
son of: Abinoam (H0042)
Another spelling of ba.raq (בָּרָק "Barak" H1301)
§ Bedan = "in judging"
1) a judge who followed Gideon
2) a Manassite
